item.title: Design Process
item.description: Function The function design process that we use is: Signature Purpose Examples (two) Function - write it. 4A. Skeleton - not visible when finished. Check-expect - examples provide correct answers. Animations See Chapter 6 Animations for the design process as it applies to writing animations (big-bang). The Animations Slides detail the issues when writing handlers.
